title: Nisus-BCD Fund invests Rs 60 crore in Project High Cliff
description: Nisus Finance, a real estate credit fund, has infused Rs 60 crore into High Cliff, a late-stage residential development located in Bellandur, Bengaluru. The funds, provided through listed non-convertible debentures, will be directed towards refinancing existing debt and ensuring the timely completion of Project High Cliff. This upscale venture spans 1.4 acres of land and boasts a saleable area of approximately 2.4 lakh sqft.
